com.gwtplatform.dispatch.client.actionhandler

Interface ExecuteCommand<A,R>

  • Type Parameters:
    A - The action type.
    R - The result type.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DelegatingAsyncCallback

    public interface ExecuteCommand<A,R>
    The interface that ClientActionHandlers use to send the action to execute to the server.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DispatchRequest execute(A action, AsyncCallback<R> resultCallback)
      Execute an action.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        DispatchRequest execute(A action,
                      AsyncCallback<R> resultCallback)
        Execute an action.
        Parameters:
        action - The action to execute.
        resultCallback - A callback that will be invoked once the action has been executed, successfully or not.
        Returns:
        A DispatchRequest representing the request, it should never be null.
